attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is for the complete ban of Hydrogen Hydroxide.

Hydrogen Hydroxide is colorless, odorless, tasteless, and kills uncounted thousands of people every year. Most of these deaths are caused by accidental inhalation, but the dangers of Hydrogen Hydroxide do not end there. Prolonged exposure to its solid form causes severe tissue damage.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
